thread.title: PLUTO TV surprises with up to 5 new free channels with more sport, cinema and music
thread.title_full: PLUTO TV surprises with up to 5 new free channels with more sport, cinema and music

author: Ruetir
title: PLUTO TV surprises with up to 5 new free channels with more sport, cinema and music
text:
There are streaming television platforms that are free all the time and not only this, but adding new channels over the days, weeks and months. One of the clearest examples is PLUTO TV, a free service in which during the next few days will have new content in the form of television channels. From more cinema and sport to special content related to women.
There are five channels that will progressively add PLUTO TV on their streaming television grill. And not all of these dials will be released at the same time. Some will arrive this February, while others will have to wait a bit, since they will not be available until March. In any case, the platform has just announced them and here you can know what are the new content that will land in its catalog.
The new channels for February and March The vast majority will be released for March, however, there is a specific dial that will land tomorrow in the PLUTO TV catalog. These are the 5 new channels with which the online television platform surprises:
PLUTO TV Awarded films
It is a new pop up channel that will be available from February 28 to March 10. Without a doubt, a dial designed for good cinema lovers. On the occasion of the celebration of the 97th edition of the Oscar Awards, this new channel will land on the platform so that users can enjoy great titles of the world of cinema: Big Eyes, always Alice, Melancholia and Hunting … among many others.
PLUTO TV Women protagonists
Another temporal channel that opens on March 7 and will be available until the end of the month, just until March 28. During the 24 hours a day, users can enjoy stories, comedies and great dramas in which the woman has a main role, such as The Good Lie, The Runaways, Gone, Miss Potter, Diana and The Young Victoria, etc.
From Friday 7 to March 28, you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best pop singers through this pop-up channel that lands on PLUTO TV. «The unmatched Karol G, Shakira, Beyoncé and Dua Lipa are some of the queens that will pass through this space with their most iconic videos. Let the music sound! «.
Leaving the temporal channels aside, the History and Life channel opens on March 14. And it comes to stay, since it is a new fixed dial for the grill of this platform. It is a new channel with which spectators can travel in time and know in a better way the history of the world, and all through the best documentaries.
If you are passionate about contact sports, the premiere of the UFC channel on March 28 is designed for you. It is an exclusive dial for over 16 years that will be broadcast between 10:00 p.m. and 06:00 hours every day. So fans will be lucky to see the best clashes and the most important moments of the main MMA organization in the world.
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->online media outlet
